mapper.select: select p.qpId, qpstatus, nvl(now, 0) now from qpPosition p, (select count(*) as now, qpId from orderInfo o, callInfo c where c.callNum = o.callNum and isget = 0 group by qpId) n, qpInfo i where p.qpId = n.qpId(+) and qpStatus = 0 and i.qpId = p.qpId and qpVehicleType = #{vehicleType} order by abs(to_number(#{bCode})-to_number(bCode)), abs(power(qplatitude-to_number(#{latitude}), 2)+power(qplongitude-to_number(#{longitude}), 2)), n.now

SELECT p.*, nvl(now, 0) now from qpPosition p, (select count(*) as now, qpId from orderInfo o, callInfo c where c.callNum = o.callNum and isget = 0 group by qpId) n, qpInfo i where p.qpId = n.qpId(+) and qpStatus = 0 and i.qpId = p.qpId and qpVehicleType = #{vehicleType} order by abs(to_number(#{hCode})-to_number(hCode)), abs(power(qplatitude-to_number(#{latitude}), 2)+power(qplongitude-to_number(#{longitude}), 2)), n.now
